segments.text: Here is your room . I hope you like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The room is away from traffic noise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where can we have our laundry done ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's a bag in the bathroom . Just put your laundry in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does the hotel run its own laundry service ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We do , as most hotels do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Is the telephone on the table good for outside calls ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is house phone only.But you can ask the operator for city calls .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I get a city map at the hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Shall I get one for you ? Just push the button over there if you need anything .
segments.speaker: S1
